post.title: 3 - Schadenfreude
post.summary: Ian and Matt discuss what it means to win at life, truancy, batman, homebrewing, having your dad as a teacher, Jupiter's shocking neural network, Ian's biodegradable EP, the different sizes of vinyl records, and Minecraft.
